name: 3orel13
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2))

stmt.origin: sylan9r(wn(w0), wn(w1), w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2, wo(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2))
-| wi(wn(w1), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wo(w0, w2), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2))
-| wi(wn(w1), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wo(w0, w2), w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wn(w1), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wo(w0, w2), w2))
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wi(w3o(w0, w2, w1), w2))

comment: Elimination of two disjuncts in a triple disjunction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jun-2011.)
